ref.div: IPCC (2007) Climate change 2007: The scientific basis. In: Solomon S, Qin D, Manning M, Chen Z, Marquis M, Averyt KB, Tignor M, Miller HL, editors. Contributions of Working Group I to the Fourth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change: “The Physical Science Basis”. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press. pp. 1–18.
